errors.error_description: Listed generic dependencies that are not the actual columnflow dependencies and used pip instead of the proper setup method
correction_candidates: Remove the pip install command and refer to the setup.sh script instead
Replace with pip install columnflow[all] for complete installation
Change to conda install columnflow from conda-forge
Use pip install -e . after cloning the repository
errors.golden_answer: Remove the pip install command and refer to the setup.sh script instead
